result.title: The Este Lauder Companies' Oevel Manufacturing & Fulfillment Campus Celebrates 60 Years of Excellence and Innovation
result.text: OEVEL, Belgium--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The Este Lauder Companies Inc. (NYSE:EL), today celebrated the sixtieth anniversary of its Manufacturing & Fulfillment Campus in Oevel, Belgium. Since its opening in 1965, the Oevel Campus has developed into a state-of-the-art manufacturing, fulfillment and biotech hub. Today the campus serves as a cornerstone of the company's global value chain and is one of its largest manufacturing facilities by volume, annually producing over 100 million prestige beauty.
